data.name: AboutTheAppText
data.value: I hope that you may enjoy while using the app. I have much of fun while i was developing the app. I you want something from the app, you can send me a mail to coderserdar@outlook.com or use Contact button in this page. If you rate the app i will so appreciated to you. Have a good day. ÇMS Software

data.name: BackgroundFeatureNote
data.value: I pay importance on the functionality of a program above the visuality of a program in my life. And i create this program with these feelings. But i know that everybody does not think like me so, i develop the background of this app changeable. In program's Background tab in General Settings, you can assign a background color or image to app. Background color is available on the whole app, but if you want you can assign a background image to to selected note folder in Background section of Folder Settings. When you get bored, you can remove the background image of the app or selected note folder.

data.name: DeleteFolderQuestion
data.value: Your Folder Will Be Deleted With All Contents. Do You Agree?

data.name: DeleteNoteQuestion
data.value: Do You Really Want To Delete Note?

data.name: ExitAppQuestion
data.value: Do you really want to exit the app?

data.name: FontFeatureNote
data.value: You can assign a font family and font size to a note folder which you want. When you select a note folder, in Font section of the Folder Settings you can assign these properties. You can see the active font family and the font size on page. If you don't assign a property, app automatically assign the Verdana and 26 px values.

data.name: LanguageFeatureNote
data.value: The app gives you full support in English, Turkish, German, Italian, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Russian, Arabic and Persian. You can see your language in whole of the pages of the app and menus.

data.name: LanguageWarning
data.value: You may restart the app to affect the changes

data.name: NoteFeatureNote
data.value: In the note page, you can see the name of note, the name of the note folder which note belongs, creation date of note and of course note :). You can navigate to next and previous note in the note folder. You can change the name of the note when you tap the note name. You can select all of the note context and you can see the note detail. You can send a selected note via SMS or E-Mail. You can delete note or change the note folder of the note.

data.name: NoteFolderFeatureNote
data.value: In a note folder, you can see the list of notes in the note folder. You can navigate to a selected note. You can delete the note folder, but when you do this, app delete the note folder with all of the notes inside the selected note folder. Because of this you should Sync your notes before doing this operation. You can add a new note to folder or change the settings of the note folder. And you can change the name of the note folder when you tap the name of the note folder.

data.name: OrderFeatureNote
data.value: You can order your notes in a selected note folder and you can also order your note folders. You can order notes and note folders by name, creation date and last modification date with ascending or descending order. You can order your note folders in Other Settings section of General Settings. You can order notes in a specific note folder in Other Settings section of Folder Settings. You can see the order settings values on the page. If you don't want to order, the app automatically order notes and note folders by name with ascending order. (Except the notes and note folders which are created by the app when the app start.)

data.name: PasswordFeatureNote
data.value: In a note folder, we can assign a password to folder from Password section in Folder Settings. In same place, you can remove the password of the selected note folder. Password have to be at least 4 digits. There is no limitation about the password must be numeric. After assigning password, program will ask you the password when you want to access note folder. You can just press Enter key after typing the password to the textboxes. This property is first at the marketplace of the Windows Phone. As you know, many people don't want to hide their shopping lists but they want to hide some special meeting notes. With this feature you can assign password which folder do you want.

data.name: ProgramFeaturesNote
data.value: Program has some features like creating note folder, assigning password to selected note folder, change the background color or image of application, change the background color or image of selected note folder, context search, OneDrive sync, change the note's note folder, send note via SMS or E-Mail, detailed font and order settings, multi language support, statistical information about the note. When the app installed, app create a local database in your mobile device and all information of the app will be stored on your mobile device. This is for your security.

data.name: ResourceFlowDirection
data.comment: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language

data.name: ResourceLanguage
data.comment: Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language.

data.name: SearchFeatureNote
data.value: App has a feature that you can search notes within note name and note context. With this feature you can not lost within your notes. You just write the search parameter and press Enter key. Search results will be shown in the same page. There is a key point that, if you try to access a note which is in a note folder which is password protected, you will be navigated to enter password to access the note file. This feature is for you and your privacy.

data.name: SearchTrimFault
data.value: You Have To Fill The Search Criteria

data.name: SyncFeatureNote
data.value: With this app you can sync all of your notes with your OneDrive account. In program's Sync section of General Settings, you should click the Sign In button and you should enter your SkyDrive account. While this process, you should accept the app access permission to complete syncronization. After login process completed, you should click the Sync button and app will create a folder (for example: Awesome Note (21.7.2014 02.08.57) ) and Sync your notes into this folder. You can follow the sync process from app's current page. Notes are synced as a text file and inside this text file you can see some detailed information about the note. Synced file name format is "Note Id. + Note Name + (Note Folder Name).txt". (for example "1. My Note (My Folder).txt") .A special point is, in this program we can not have any information about you like your note folder password. If you forgot your password, you can successfully access your protected notes just using Sync your notes in OneDrive.

data.name: TwoFieldsNotSame
data.value: The Two Password Values Are Not Same

data.name: WelcomeNote
data.value: Hi. I like taking notes and i use a lot of note taking program in PC and mobile devices. I want to create a good note taking app for you. I hope that you will be satisfied the app.
